to enroll new students/to get students
to seek investment or funding/investment promotion

to recruit/to enlist

sentences.english: Now financial firms recruit from the cream of the Ivy League.
sentences.chinese: 現在，金融公司招的都是長春藤聯盟的“三好學生”。

sentences.english: Example: A woman is married to Mr. Zhao.
sentences.chinese: 一個女人與招先生結了婚。

sentences.english: Finishing strokes in Swedish massage involve swooping around the body in a butterfly motion.
sentences.chinese: 瑞典按摩整理招涉及身體周圍的蝴蝶飛在議案。

sentences.english: Plan of IFB, Auction, Listing for project land.
The beautiful lady smiles and waves her hand to the handsome guy.
sentences.chinese: 這位漂亮的女士笑着朝這個英俊的小夥子招了招手。

sentences.english: Does Wuhan have advertizing company recruit the graphic designing probationer's?
sentences.chinese: 武漢哪有廣告公司招平面設計實習生的？

sentences.english: One point of lazy is most favorable, that is, everybody knows it without being taught.
sentences.chinese: “懶惰”有一點特別招人喜歡，那就是不用學就會。

sentences.english: Don't risk drawing down his anger.
Weak systems of secondary education feed into the problem of enrolling adequate numbers of students.
sentences.chinese: 由於中級教育系統薄弱，醫學院校招不到足夠的學生。

sentences.english: Variations of the kamikaze trick with your Yo-Yo in this free yo-yo video.
sentences.chinese: 與你之間的溜溜球神風招變化在這個自由溜溜球視頻。

sentences.english: The Law School admits one entering class each year for courses beginning in late August.
sentences.chinese: 法學院每年都招一個八月下旬入學班。

sentences.english: I'm busy very much, my superior give me a person and asked me to teach him.
sentences.chinese: 實在太忙了，上級招了個人來讓我帶着做。

sentences.english: Shall we hire a handsome driver?
sentences.chinese: 我們要不要招一個長得英俊的司機？

sentences.english: We are adored usually because of our weaknesses instead of merits.
sentences.chinese: 峩門巠長飠由於臫鯓旳缺點而丆飠優點招人喜歡。

sentences.english: The key is to "hit hard and hit often."
sentences.chinese: 關鍵是要“多次出招，招招迅猛”。
